     27 var (
     28 	flagCodesearch   = flag.String("codesearch", "", "Path to the `codesearch` binary")
     29 	flagFetchReindex = flag.String("fetch-reindex", "", "Path to the `livegrep-fetch-reindex` binary")
     30 	flagApiBaseUrl   = flag.String("api-base-url", "https://api.github.com/", "Github API base url")

     32 	flagRepoDir      = flag.String("dir", "repos", "Directory to store repos")
     33 	flagIgnorelist   = flag.String("ignorelist", "", "File containing a list of repositories to ignore when indexing")
     34 	flagDeprecatedBL = flag.String("blacklist", "", "[DEPRECATED] "+BLDeprecatedMessage)
     35 	flagIndexPath    = dynamicDefault{
     36 		display: "${dir}/livegrep.idx",
     37 		fn:      func() string { return path.Join(*flagRepoDir, "livegrep.idx") },
     38 	}
     39 	flagRevision                = flag.String("revision", "HEAD", "git revision to index")
     40 	flagUrlPattern              = flag.String("url-pattern", "https://github.com/{name}/blob/{version}/{path}#L{lno}", "when using the local frontend fileviewer, this string will be used to construt a link to the file source on github")
     41 	flagName                    = flag.String("name", "livegrep index", "The name to be stored in the index file")
     42 	flagNumRepoUpdateWorkers    = flag.String("num-repo-update-workers", "8", "Number of workers fetch-reindex will use to update repositories")
     43 	flagRevparse                = flag.Bool("revparse", true, "whether to `git rev-parse` the provided revision in generated links")
     44 	flagForks                   = flag.Bool("forks", true, "whether to index repositories that are github forks, and not original repos")
     45 	flagArchived                = flag.Bool("archived", false, "whether to index repositories that are archived on github")
     46 	flagHTTP                    = flag.Bool("http", false, "clone repositories over HTTPS instead of SSH")
     47 	flagHTTPUsername            = flag.String("http-user", "git", "Override the username to use when cloning over https")
     48 	flagInstallation            = flag.Bool("installation-token", false, "Treat the API key as a Github Application Installation Key when cloning")
     49 	flagDepth                   = flag.Int("depth", 0, "clone repository with specify --depth=N depth.")
     50 	flagSkipMissing             = flag.Bool("skip-missing", false, "skip repositories where the specified revision is missing")
     51 	flagMaxConcurrentGHRequests = flag.Int("max-concurrent-gh-requests", 1, "Applied per org/user. If fetching 2 orgs, you will have 2x{yourInput} network calls possible at a time")
     52 	flagNoIndex                 = flag.Bool("no-index", false, "Skip indexing after writing config")
     53 
     54 	flagRepos = stringList{}
     55 	flagOrgs  = stringList{}
     56 	flagUsers = stringList{}

     59 func init() {
     60 	flag.Var(&flagIndexPath, "out", "Path to write the index")
     61 	flag.Var(&flagRepos, "repo", "Specify a repo to index (may be passed multiple times)")
     62 	flag.Var(&flagOrgs, "org", "Specify a github organization to index (may be passed multiple times)")
     63 	flag.Var(&flagUsers, "user", "Specify a github user to index (may be passed multiple times)")
     64 }

     66 const Workers = 8
     67 
     68 func main() {
     69 	flag.Parse()
     70 	log.SetFlags(0)
     71 
     72 	if *flagDeprecatedBL != "" {
     73 		log.Fatalln(BLDeprecatedMessage)
     74 	}
     75 
     76 	if flagRepos.strings == nil &&
     77 		flagOrgs.strings == nil &&
     78 		flagUsers.strings == nil {
     79 		log.Fatal("You must specify at least one repo or organization to index")
     80 	}
     81 
     82 	if *flagInstallation {
     83 		if *flagGithubKey == "" {
     84 			log.Fatal("-installation-key requires passing a github key, via either -github-key or $GITHUB_KEY")
     85 		}
     86 		*flagHTTP = true
     87 		*flagHTTPUsername = "x-access-token"
     88 	}
     89 
     90 	var ignorelist map[string]struct{}
     91 	if *flagIgnorelist != "" {
     92 		var err error
     93 		ignorelist, err = loadIgnorelist(*flagIgnorelist)
     94 		if err != nil {
     95 			log.Fatalf("loading %s: %s", *flagIgnorelist, err)
     96 		}
     97 	}
     98 
     99 	var h *http.Client
    100 	if *flagGithubKey == "" {
    101 		h = http.DefaultClient
    102 	} else {
    103 		tok := &oauth2.Token{AccessToken: *flagGithubKey}
    104 		h = oauth2.NewClient(
    105 			context.Background(),
    106 			oauth2.StaticTokenSource(tok),
    107 		)
    108 	}
    109 
    110 	gh := github.NewClient(h)
    111 
    112 	if *flagApiBaseUrl != "" {
    113 		if !strings.HasSuffix(*flagApiBaseUrl, "/") {
    114 			log.Fatalf("API base URL must include trailing slash: %s", *flagApiBaseUrl)
    115 		}
    116 		baseURL, err := url.Parse(*flagApiBaseUrl)
    117 		if err != nil {
    118 			log.Fatalf("parsing base url %s: %v", *flagApiBaseUrl, err)
    119 		}
    120 		gh.BaseURL = baseURL
    121 	}
    122 
    123 	repos, err := loadRepos(gh,
    124 		flagRepos.strings,
    125 		flagOrgs.strings,
    126 		flagUsers.strings)
    127 	if err != nil {
    128 		log.Fatalln(err.Error())
    129 	}
    130 
    131 	repos = filterRepos(repos, ignorelist, !*flagForks, !*flagArchived)
    132 
    133 	sort.Sort(ReposByName(repos))
    134 
    135 	config, err := buildConfig(*flagName, *flagRepoDir, repos, *flagRevision)
    136 	if err != nil {
    137 		log.Fatalln(err.Error())
    138 	}
    139 	configPath := path.Join(*flagRepoDir, "livegrep.json")
    140 	if err := writeConfig(config, configPath); err != nil {
    141 		log.Fatalln(err.Error())
    142 	}
    143 	if *flagNoIndex {
    144 		log.Printf("Skipping indexing after writing config")
    145 		return
    146 	}
    147 
    148 	index := flagIndexPath.Get().(string)
    149 
    150 	args := []string{
    151 		"--out", index,
    152 		"--codesearch", *flagCodesearch,
    153 		"--num-workers", *flagNumRepoUpdateWorkers,
    154 	}
    155 	if *flagRevparse {
    156 		args = append(args, "--revparse")
    157 	}
    158 	if *flagSkipMissing {
    159 		args = append(args, "--skip-missing")
    160 	}
    161 	args = append(args, configPath)
    162 
    163 	if *flagFetchReindex == "" {
    164 		fr := findBinary("livegrep-fetch-reindex")
    165 		flagFetchReindex = &fr
    166 	}
    167 
    168 	log.Printf("Running: %s %v\n", *flagFetchReindex, args)
    169 	cmd := exec.Command(*flagFetchReindex, args...)
    170 	cmd.Stdout = os.Stdout
    171 	cmd.Stderr = os.Stderr
    172 	if *flagGithubKey != "" {
    173 		cmd.Env = append(os.Environ(), fmt.Sprintf("GITHUB_KEY=%s", *flagGithubKey))
    174 	}
    175 	if err := cmd.Run(); err != nil {
    176 		log.Fatalln("livegrep-fetch-reindex: ", err)
    177 	}
    178 }

    180 func findBinary(name string) string {
    181 	paths := []string{
    182 		path.Join(path.Dir(os.Args[0]), name),
    183 		strings.Replace(os.Args[0], path.Base(os.Args[0]), name, -1),
    184 	}
    185 	for _, try := range paths {
    186 		if st, err := os.Stat(try); err == nil && (st.Mode()&os.ModeDir) == 0 {
    187 			return try
    188 		}
    189 	}
    190 	return name
    191 }

    193 type ReposByName []*github.Repository
    194 
    195 func (r ReposByName) Len() int           { return len(r) }
    196 func (r ReposByName) Swap(i, j int)      { r[i], r[j] = r[j], r[i] }
    197 func (r ReposByName) Less(i, j int) bool { return *r[i].FullName < *r[j].FullName }
    198 
    199 func loadIgnorelist(path string) (map[string]struct{}, error) {
    200 	data, err := ioutil.ReadFile(path)
    201 	if err != nil {
    202 		return nil, err
    203 	}
    204 
    205 	lines := strings.Split(string(data), "\n")
    206 	out := make(map[string]struct{}, len(lines))
    207 	for _, l := range lines {
    208 		out[l] = struct{}{}
    209 	}
    210 	return out, nil
    211 }
    212 
    213 type loadJob struct {
    214 	obj string
    215 	get func(*github.Client, string) ([]*github.Repository, error)
    216 }
    217 
    218 type maybeRepo struct {
    219 	repos []*github.Repository
    220 	err   error
    221 }
    222 
    223 func loadRepos(
    224 	client *github.Client,
    225 	repos []string,
    226 	orgs []string,
    227 	users []string) ([]*github.Repository, error) {
    228 
    229 	jobc := make(chan loadJob)
    230 	done := make(chan struct{})
    231 	repoc := make(chan maybeRepo)
    232 
    233 	var jobs []loadJob
    234 	for _, repo := range repos {
    235 		jobs = append(jobs, loadJob{repo, getOneRepo})
    236 	}
    237 	for _, org := range orgs {
    238 		jobs = append(jobs, loadJob{org, getOrgRepos})
    239 	}
    240 	for _, user := range users {
    241 		jobs = append(jobs, loadJob{user, getUserRepos})
    242 	}
    243 	go func() {
    244 		defer close(jobc)
    245 		for _, j := range jobs {
    246 			select {
    247 			case jobc <- j:
    248 			case <-done:
    249 				return
    250 			}
    251 		}
    252 	}()
    253 	var wg sync.WaitGroup
    254 	wg.Add(Workers)
    255 	for i := 0; i < Workers; i++ {
    256 		go func() {
    257 			runJobs(client, jobc, done, repoc)
    258 			wg.Done()
    259 		}()
    260 	}
    261 	go func() {
    262 		wg.Wait()
    263 		close(repoc)
    264 	}()
    265 	var out []*github.Repository
    266 	for repo := range repoc {
    267 		if repo.err != nil {
    268 			close(done)
    269 			return nil, repo.err
    270 		}
    271 		out = append(out, repo.repos...)
    272 	}
    273 
    274 	return out, nil
    275 }
    276 
    277 func runJobs(client *github.Client, jobc <-chan loadJob, done <-chan struct{}, out chan<- maybeRepo) {
    278 	for {
    279 		var job loadJob
    280 		var ok bool
    281 		select {
    282 		case job, ok = <-jobc:
    283 			if !ok {
    284 				return
    285 			}
    286 		case <-done:
    287 			return
    288 		}
    289 		var res maybeRepo
    290 		res.repos, res.err = job.get(client, job.obj)
    291 		select {
    292 		case out <- res:
    293 		case <-done:
    294 			return
    295 		}
    296 	}
    297 }
    298 
    299 func filterRepos(repos []*github.Repository,
    300 	ignorelist map[string]struct{},
    301 	excludeForks bool, excludeArchived bool) []*github.Repository {
    302 	var out []*github.Repository
    303 
    304 	for _, r := range repos {
    305 		if excludeForks && r.Fork != nil && *r.Fork {
    306 			log.Printf("Excluding fork %s...", *r.FullName)
    307 			continue
    308 		}
    309 		if excludeArchived && r.Archived != nil && *r.Archived {
    310 			log.Printf("Excluding archived %s...", *r.FullName)
    311 			continue
    312 		}
    313 		if ignorelist != nil {
    314 			if _, ok := ignorelist[*r.FullName]; ok {
    315 				continue
    316 			}
    317 		}
    318 		out = append(out, r)
    319 	}
    320 
    321 	return out
    322 }
    323 
    324 func getOneRepo(client *github.Client, repo string) ([]*github.Repository, error) {
    325 	bits := strings.SplitN(repo, "/", 2)
    326 	if len(bits) != 2 {
    327 		return nil, fmt.Errorf("Bad repository: %s", repo)
    328 	}
    329 
    330 	ghRepo, _, err := client.Repositories.Get(context.TODO(), bits[0], bits[1])
    331 	if err != nil {
    332 		return nil, err
    333 	}
    334 	return []*github.Repository{ghRepo}, nil
    335 }

    337 type IndexedResponse struct {
    338 	Page  int
    339 	Org   string
    340 	Repos []*github.Repository
    341 	err   error
    342 }
    343 
    344 func callGitHubConcurrently(initialResp *github.Response, concurrencyLimit int, firstResult []*github.Repository, gClient *github.Client, method string, org string, user string) ([]*github.Repository, error) {
    345 	pagesToCall := initialResp.LastPage - 1
    346 
    347 	// create the matrix of results and add the first one - this is so we can maintain order
    348 	// which unfortunately takes an extra O(n) pass
    349 	resultsMatrix := make([][]*github.Repository, pagesToCall+1)
    350 	resultsMatrix[0] = firstResult
    351 
    352 	semaphores := make(chan bool, concurrencyLimit)
    353 	resStream := make(chan *IndexedResponse, pagesToCall)
    354 	var wg sync.WaitGroup
    355 
    356 	ctx, cancel := context.WithCancel(context.Background())
    357 	defer cancel()
    358 
    359 	for i := 1; i <= pagesToCall; i++ {
    360 		wg.Add(1)
    361 
    362 		go func(ctx context.Context, page int, c chan *IndexedResponse, s chan bool, w *sync.WaitGroup) {
    363 			s <- true // aquire semaphore
    364 			defer w.Done()
    365 
    366 			var repos []*github.Repository
    367 			var err error
    368 			if method == "org" {
    369 				repos, _, err = gClient.Repositories.ListByOrg(ctx, org, &github.RepositoryListByOrgOptions{
    370 					ListOptions: github.ListOptions{PerPage: 100, Page: page},
    371 				})
    372 			} else if method == "user" {
    373 				repos, _, err = gClient.Repositories.List(ctx, user, &github.RepositoryListOptions{
    374 					ListOptions: github.ListOptions{PerPage: 100, Page: page},
    375 				})
    376 			}
    377 
    378 			c <- &IndexedResponse{
    379 				Page:  page,
    380 				Repos: repos,
    381 				Org:   org,
    382 				err:   err,
    383 			}
    384 			<-s // release semaphore
    385 		}(ctx, i+1, resStream, semaphores, &wg) // + 1 because pages are 1 based, and we already called 1st to start with
    386 	}
    387 
    388 	// close the channel in the background
    389 	go func() {
    390 		wg.Wait()
    391 		close(resStream)
    392 		close(semaphores)
    393 	}()
    394 
    395 	for res := range resStream {
    396 		if res.err != nil {
    397 			return nil, res.err // cancel will be called after this early return
    398 		}
    399 		resultsMatrix[res.Page-1] = res.Repos // Page index is 1 based
    400 	}
    401 
    402 	// Now flatten the matrix and return it
    403 	var buf []*github.Repository
    404 	for _, res := range resultsMatrix {
    405 		buf = append(buf, res...)
    406 	}
    407 
    408 	return buf, nil
    409 }

    411 func getOrgRepos(client *github.Client, org string) ([]*github.Repository, error) {
    412 	log.Printf("Fetching repositories for organization: %s", org)
    413 
    414 	opt := &github.RepositoryListByOrgOptions{
    415 		ListOptions: github.ListOptions{PerPage: 100},
    416 	}
    417 	repos, resp, err := client.Repositories.ListByOrg(context.TODO(), org, opt)
    418 
    419 	if err != nil {
    420 		return nil, err
    421 	} else if resp.FirstPage == resp.LastPage { // if no more pages, return early
    422 		return repos, nil
    423 	}
    424 
    425 	// when flagMaxConcurrentGHRequests is 1 (default), behaves synchronously
    426 	return callGitHubConcurrently(resp, *flagMaxConcurrentGHRequests, repos, client, "org", org, "")
    427 }
    428 
    429 func getUserRepos(client *github.Client, user string) ([]*github.Repository, error) {
    430 	log.Printf("Fetching repositories for user: %s", user)
    431 
    432 	opt := &github.RepositoryListOptions{
    433 		ListOptions: github.ListOptions{PerPage: 100},
    434 	}
    435 	repos, resp, err := client.Repositories.List(context.TODO(), user, opt)
    436 	if err != nil {
    437 		return nil, err
    438 	} else if resp.FirstPage == resp.LastPage { // if no more pages, return early
    439 		return repos, nil
    440 	}
    441 
    442 	// when flagMaxConcurrentGHRequests is 1 (default), behaves synchronously
    443 	return callGitHubConcurrently(resp, *flagMaxConcurrentGHRequests, repos, client, "user", "", user)
    444 }

    446 func writeConfig(config []byte, file string) error {
    447 	dir := path.Dir(file)
    448 	if err := os.MkdirAll(dir, 0755); err != nil {
    449 		return err
    450 	}
    451 	return ioutil.WriteFile(file, config, 0644)
    452 }
    453 
    454 func buildConfig(name string,
    455 	dir string,
    456 	repos []*github.Repository,
    457 	revision string) ([]byte, error) {
    458 	cfg := config.IndexSpec{
    459 		Name: name,
    460 	}
    461 
    462 	for _, r := range repos {
    463 		if *flagSkipMissing {
    464 			cmd := exec.Command("git",
    465 				"--git-dir",
    466 				path.Join(dir, *r.FullName),
    467 				"rev-parse",
    468 				"--verify",
    469 				revision,
    470 			)
    471 			if e := cmd.Run(); e != nil {
    472 				log.Printf("Skipping missing revision repo=%s rev=%s",
    473 					*r.FullName, revision,
    474 				)
    475 				continue
    476 			}
    477 		}
    478 		var remote string
    479 		if *flagHTTP {
    480 			remote = *r.CloneURL
    481 		} else {
    482 			remote = *r.SSHURL
    483 		}
    484 
    485 		var password_env string
    486 		if *flagGithubKey != "" {
    487 			password_env = "GITHUB_KEY"
    488 		}
    489 
    490 		cfg.Repositories = append(cfg.Repositories, &config.RepoSpec{
    491 			Path:      path.Join(dir, *r.FullName),
    492 			Name:      *r.FullName,
    493 			Revisions: []string{revision},
    494 			Metadata: &config.Metadata{
    495 				Github:     *r.HTMLURL,
    496 				Remote:     remote,
    497 				UrlPattern: *flagUrlPattern,
    498 			},
    499 			CloneOptions: &config.CloneOptions{
    500 				Depth:       int32(*flagDepth),
    501 				Username:    *flagHTTPUsername,
    502 				PasswordEnv: password_env,
    503 			},
    504 		})
    505 	}
    506 
    507 	return json.MarshalIndent(cfg, "", "  ")
    508 }
